page.title: 09Industry (Part4)
page.content: The parts are then sorted and sent to the Austin Motor car factories for assembly. {Burlington Fabrics:-}produces materials which are sold to Marks and Spencers and Littlewoods.The factory started in Treforest twenty eight years ago.The factory is open night and day and employees work continental shifts. {Penallta Trading Estate:-}There are about twenty factories on this estate employing four hundred people;Giroflex makes office seating,there is Rhymney Valley training workshop for the unemployed,the Trosnant farm man power training scheme,Scandinavian Design making Christmas decorations,Extrusion Facilities,Heston Codan makes rubber attachments,Contract Maintenance and Oak Windows. {________________
